reviewText: I AM A CHARLIE BRONSON FAN. BUT DISLIKED THESE TWO MOVIES.

this is two excellent movies with charles bronson
he was one of the great actors of his time
Enjoy
Lola: A romantic drama that casts Charles Bronson in an atypical role as a middle-aged American writer named Scott who is visiting London. U.S. Marshal-Pursuit: Charles Bronson is a soldier who goes AWOL by blasting his way out of camp.
